content:
ICS 247 - Security Algorithms Assignments

Winter, 2004

Notes:

  • For each student, their lowest homework score, from among the set of possible homeworks, will automatically be converted to a perfect 100%.
  • Some of the homeworks are in PDF format. Viewing these files requires the use of a PDF Reader. Some others are in PostScript, which requires requires the use of a Postscript viewer.

Assignments:

  • Homework 1: due Friday, January 23, 2004, in class, 50 points. (Also available in Postscript.)
  • Homework 2: due Friday, January 30, 2004, in class, 50 points. (Also available in Postscript.)
  • Homework 3: due Friday, February 6, 2004, in class, 50 points. (Also available in Postscript.)
  • Homework 4: due Friday, February 27, 2004, in class, 50 points.
  • Homework 5: due Friday, March 12, 2004, in class, 50 points. (Also available in Postscript.)

Goodrich's Home Page.
